explains: v. 重建，重造； 使复原，使恢复
n. （尤指车辆等机器的）重新组装；（尤指车辆等）改装的机器

sentences.en: Camels rebuild fat stores in their hump.
sentences.cn: 骆驼在自己的驼峰内重新贮备脂肪。

sentences.en: When she lost her job, she had to rebuild her life completely.
sentences.cn: 她丢了工作以后，不得不彻底重新安排自己的生活。

sentences.en: America and her partners are helping to rebuild roads and bridges and buildings.
sentences.cn: 美国及其伙伴正帮助重建道路、桥梁和楼房。
